cards.name: Frigga
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a copy of the last card you played to your hand. (if able)

cards.name: Gorr
cards.ability: Ongoing: +2 Power for EACH On Reveal card in play.

cards.name: Grand Master
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move one of your other On Reveal cards here to the middle location. Its ability happens again.

cards.name: Hellcow
cards.ability: Activate: Discard a card from your hand.

cards.name: Emperor Hulkling
cards.ability: At the start of the game, copy the text of a random 6-Cost card.

cards.name: King Eitri
cards.ability: Activate: Draw a card that didn't start in your deck.

cards.name: Laufey
cards.ability: On Reveal: Steal 1 Power from each other card here.

cards.name: Malekith
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a 1, 2, or 3-Cost card from your deck here. It reveals at the end of the game.

cards.name: Okoye
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give every card in your deck +1 Power.

cards.name: Scream
cards.ability: When an enemy card moves, steal 2 Power from it. (once per turn)

cards.name: Surtur
cards.ability: After you play a card with 10+ Power, this gains +3 Power.

cards.name: Viper
cards.ability: On Reveal: One of your other cards here with the lowest Power switches sides.

cards.name: Widow's Kiss
cards.ability: Destroy this when your side of this location is full.

cards.name: Zabu
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

items.title: Celebr8bit Card Back
items: Login on an iOS device to claim Wolverine 'Celebr8bit' Card Back

items.title: League
items: 1st - Deadpool 'Celebr8bitpool' Card Back, Moon Girl & Devil Dinosaur 'Games!' Variant, 3x Black Matte Borders, 310 Boosters
2nd - Deadpool 'Celebr8bitpool' Card Back, Moon Girl & Devil Dinosaur 'Games!' Variant, 2x Black Matte Borders, 310 Boosters
3rd - Deadpool 'Celebr8bitpool' Card Back, Moon Girl & Devil Dinosaur 'Games!' Variant, Black Matte Border, 310 Boosters
4th-5th - Deadpool 'Celebr8bitpool' Card Back, Moon Girl & Devil Dinosaur 'Games!' Variant, 310 Boosters

items.title: Second Anniversary
items: Head to marvelsnap.com to vote for a free Variant: Destroyer, Armor, or Howard the Duck

items.title: Collector's Vault
items: Acquire rare or exclusive bundle Variants that you may have previously missed from the shop

items.name: Zabu
changes: 2/3 - On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 4-Cost cards cost 1 less.
1/2 - On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

items.name: Hellcow
changes: 4/6 - Activate: Discard 2 cards from your hand.
4/7 - Activate: Discard a card from your hand.

items.name: Widow's Kiss (White Widow)
changes: 0/0 - Ongoing: This has -3 Power. Disable this ability if your side of this location is full.
0/-4 - Destroy this when your side of this location is full.

items.name: Viper
changes: 3/5 - On Reveal: One of your other cards here with the lowest Power switches sides.

items.name: Scream
changes: 2/2 - When an enemy card moves, steal 2 Power from it. (once per turn).

items.name: Grand Master
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Move one of your other On Reveal cards here to the middle location. Its ability happens again.

items.name: Emperor Hulkling
changes: 6/11 - At the start of the game, copy the text of a random 6-Cost card.

items.name: Okoye
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Give every card in your deck +1 Power.
